name: Terrorium
description:
The Terrorium is now live! 

You are an insect, genetically modified for the purpose of fighting other insects within the Terrorium. Will you consume other insects to sustain yourself while spraying them with acid? Will you adapt to the dangers of the Terrorium, via customizable parts?

Will you reach that viewers and score milestone?!

The Terrorium event now features:

- Unlockable parts for the genetically adjusted to use! (literally swap heads)

- Variety of enemy insects to fight to the death with! (Beetles, Flies and Striders oh my!)

- Extremely realistic bug shooting action!! 

Credits:

Baylee Windebank
blaken117
Noran Murmur
